data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Little Cayman, Cayman Islands to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Little Cayman, Cayman Islands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 42 believers in Little Cayman.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 200 souls in Little Cayman and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 200 citizens of Little Cayman, Cayman Islands, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Little Cayman
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Little Cayman, Little Cayman, Cayman Islands.
Father, let the threatened of Little Cayman, Cayman Islands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Little Cayman, Cayman Islands find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Little Cayman, Cayman Islands has a population of 200.

We estimate Little Cayman has 42 people who might know Jesus, 121 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Little Cayman, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
